mapper.select: SELECT branch_no branchNo, sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, item_name itemName, expire_memo expireMemo, quantity, createdate FROM sports_equipment_expire LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, item_name itemName, item_price itemPrice, updatedate FROM sports_equipment LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, item_name itemName, item_price itemPrice FROM sports_equipment WHERE sports_equipment_no = #{sportsEquipmentNo}

SELECT seo.branch_no branchNo, seo.sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, se.item_name itemName, se.item_price itemPrice, seo.quantity, (se.item_price*seo.quantity) totalPrice, seo.order_status orderStatus, seo.createdate FROM sports_equipment_order seo INNER JOIN sports_equipment se ON seo.sports_equipment_no = se.sports_equipment_no
SELECT branch_no branchNo, sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, quantity, total_price totalPrice, updatedate FROM sports_equipment_order WHERE branch_no = #{branchNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sportsEquipmentExpire( sports_equipment_no, branch_no, item_name, quantity, expire_memo ) VALUES ( #{sportsEquipmentNo}, #{branchNo}, #{itemName}, #{quantity}, #{expireMemo} )

INSERT INTO sports_equipment_img( sports_equipment_no, sports_equipment_img_origin_name, sports_equipment_img_file_name, sports_equipment_img_size, sports_equipment_img_type ) VALUES ( #{sportsEquipmentNo}, #{sportsEquipmentImgOriginName}, #{sportsEquipmentImgFileName}, #{sportsEquipmentImgSize}, #{sportsEquipmentImgType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sports_equipment SET item_name = #{itemName}, item_price = #{itemPrice}, updatedate = NOW() WHERE sports_equipment_no = #{sportsEquipmentNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT se.sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, seo.branch_no branchNo, se.item_name itemName,
(SUM(seo.quantity) - SUM(see.quantity)) quantity FROM sports_equipment_order seo INNER JOIN sports_equipment se ON seo.sports_equipment_no = se.sports_equipment_no INNER JOIN sports_equipment_expire see ON se.sports_equipment_no = see.sports_equipment_no
INNER JOIN branch b ON seo.branch_no = b.branch_no WHERE b.branch_no = #{branchNo} AND seo.order_status ='승인' GROUP BY se.sports_equipment_no
